name: Midnight Drift HD
description:
Midnight Drift is an overhead racing game with amazing drift physics. Earn drift points and compete in time trials on full length downhill mountain tracks.

Worldwide ranking system: See where your drift scores and track times rank up against everyone else.
Fully customize cars: Paint, Auras, Body Kits, Skid Mark Colors, Engines, etc.
Unique track design: Course design unlike any other game, no boring track loops. Snow map included!!

Control your car with tilt controls, or advanced arrow recognition system.

19 Achievements with unique challenges.

Multiplayer coming soon!
